entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
